amendatorysection.para: Any person, firm, or corporation, their agents or servants, who shall violate any of the provisions of sections 71-201 to 71-237 shall be deemed guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

annotation.para: Under former law section prescribed no penalty for cutting hair without a haircutters' certificate of registration as required by former section 71-203. Lane v. State, 120 Neb. 302, 232 N.W. 96 (1930).
